extracted_text: [4] May be decreased to 8,140 sf per unit for voluntary compliance with Section 6.2.3, Single-Family Residential Design Guidelines.
llm_outputs.rationale: The table on page 144 shows the minimum lot area for two-family dwellings in the B-2 district as 15,000 sq ft. Note [4] on page 145 indicates this can be reduced to 8,140 sq ft per unit if voluntarily complying with certain design guidelines.
llm_outputs.answer: 15,000 sq ft (may be reduced to 8,140 sq ft per unit)
